question: Is there a relationship between migrane or severe headaches and nuropothy/diabetes? My husband gets them and they are a quick onset with little to no warning.  His blood sugars are ok, and his blood pressure is ok.  (At the time of his headache)  He says on a scale of 1-10, he is a 17!  His nuropothy is in his left hand.  He cannot close a few of his fingers on his left hand.
title: Diabetes II
